Name: Moe Moe 2-Ji Daisenryaku Ultra Deluxe
Overview:
Grand Strategy Series It can be seen as one of them Turn system Strategy simulation game However, the system has been significantly simplified, introducing the concepts of level, skill, and special move. Also, the main characters are as the title suggests WWII Weapons that appeared in Personified as a girl It is something. These characters play the role of main units, and each has a special move that can be activated under certain conditions, and a graphic with damaged clothing displayed when receiving a certain amount of damage (regardless of friend or foe). Each character is designed by multiple illustrators as described below. There are also character voices, so it's not much different from regular AVGs. Furthermore, some conventional weapon units that are not anthropomorphic also appear, and can be formed as subordinates of the main unit. The countries that appear are Japan · Germany With the two Axis countries America · UK · USSR It has become one of the three Allied powers 『』Deluxe and has since become an Axis power Italy But to the Allies China Has joined). The game screen (simulation part) used a 3D model Quarter view Is adopted.

Also, in the adventure part, there are many lines based on anime Death flag Etc Internet slang It is also characterized by the abundance of.
